All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
This class represents the main application panel for a game.
AudioUnit
Audio unit class is responsible for playing audio clips
AudioUnit.AudioClip
 
AutoActor
Represents an enemy in the game.
AutoActor.Direction
 
AutoActor.PluginLoader
Loads custom actors using a plugin-based design.
Board
Represents the board for a given level.
Camera
Represents the position of the focus area on the maze grid
Camera.State
 
Chap
Represents the player in Larry Croft's Adventures.
Chap.Direction
Represents the four possible directions for movement of the player.
Chap.State
Stores the state of the game.
DomainTest
JUnit tests for the domain package.
Door
Represents a tile containing a door.
Exit
Represents a tile that completes the current level.
ExitLock
Represents a tile that is locked until all the treasures are collected.
Free
Represents a tile that the player can stand on or move in the direction of.
HelpDialog
HelpDialog is a custom dialog that displays game rules and instructions for the Larry Croft's Adventures game.
IllegalMove
An exception to throw when an illegal move is attempted by the player.
InfoField
Represents a tile that has an information message pop up when the player steps onto it.
Item
Represents an item that is stored in the player's inventory.
Key
Represents a key that is stored in the inventory.
Key.Colour
Represents the colour of keys and doors.
KeyBindingsPanel
JPanel display for all the possible KeyBindings and their purposes
KeyboardInputHandler
KeyboardInputHandler is a class responsible for handling keyboard input in the Larry Croft's Adventures game.
KeyTile
Represents a tile that has a collectible key.
Main
The main class for Larry Croft's Adventures game.
Move
 
PausedPanel
The Jpanel to display ontop of the game when the game is paused.
Persistency
This class handles the persistence of the game state, allowing loading and saving of games.
PersistencyTest
 
PluginLoader<T>
Loads custom actors using a plugin-based design.
Recorder
 
RecorderPanel
RecorderPanel is a JPanel that provides recording and playback controls for the Larry Croft's Adventures game.
RecorderTest
 
Renderer
The Renderer class is responsible for rendering the game board, characters and items on the JPanel as well as changing the view of the board when character moves.
Renderer.Images
 
Tile
Represents a square on the board.
Treasure
Represents a tile that has a collectible treasure.
Wall
Represents a tile that cannot be stepped on by the player.
